scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This two-page letter was written by Mary Johnstonto Mrs. Slocum, February 12, 1914. She acknowledges the receipt of Mrs. Slocum's letter and her request for some comments from Mary Johnstonconcerning her book Hagar,presumably for a club meeting.
